mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Moore, A. D. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Moore, A. D.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Gov of Va Wheeling Mch 23 1863. By Telegraph from Rowlesburg 23 1863. It will not be safe to hold an election at, LH George without mlitary protection can get it AD Moore Sheriff Tucker Co 17 U 56Coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Moore, A. D.
Rowlesburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
